settings.chartTitle: Recent Tests - No Of Users Vs Avg Throughput Vs Errors
settings.chartDescription: Recent Tests - No Of Users Vs Avg Throughput Vs Errors

variables.variableQuery: select testName from tests order by updated DESC limit 5;

config.DatabaseQuery:
SELECT ts.avgThroughput as Throughput, DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS metric 
from testrunsummary ts 
JOIN testruns tr ON ts.masterId = tr.masterId 
WHERE  $_timeFilter(tr.created)
GROUP BY ts.masterId
order by tr.created DESC

SELECT tr.maxUsers as 'Max Users', DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS metric 
from testrunsummary ts 
JOIN testruns tr ON ts.masterId = tr.masterId 
WHERE  $_timeFilter(tr.created)
GROUP BY ts.masterId
order by tr.created DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN ts.errorsCount IS NOT NULL 
       THEN ts.errorsCount
       ELSE 0
END AS errors, DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS metric 
from testrunsummary ts 
JOIN testruns tr ON ts.masterId = tr.masterId 
WHERE $_timeFilter(tr.created)
GROUP BY ts.masterId
order by tr.created DESC;
